features: Construction: Wide and clean horizontal baffle to prevent the down from moving
Zipper: YKK two-way zipper with Quartz Co. signature
Hood: Fixed with internal headband adjustment
Cuffs: Storm cuffs insulated for a secure and comfortable fit
Pockets: Two hidden hand pockets, lined in microthermal polyester. Inside pocket with zipper closure for easy access and the safe storage of essential items
Signature Quartz Co. patch: Black Embossed Silicone
tech_specs.\u2022 Technical outer fabric: 100% waterproof and breathable Japanese nylon, bluesign® certified.
tech_specs.\u2022 Care: Machine washable in cold water using gentle cycle and mild soap; no fabric softener. Machine dry on low heat with washing balls. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
